subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: When the Knicks and the Sixers, the two worst teams in the Atlantic Division, clashed Friday, the Knicks got the better of Philadelphia by spreading the ball around and leading almost the entire game.
snippet: When the Knicks and the Sixers, the two worst teams in the Atlantic Division, clashed Friday, the Knicks got the better of Philadelphia by spreading the ball around and leading almost the entire game.
